_description: Configuration for a dedicated business WhatsApp number. Open for customer inquiries with optional spam blocking.
_use_case: Customer support, public business bot, community manager

whatsapp._comment2: Options: business, support, sales, marketing, etc.
whatsapp._comment3: DM Policy - open for customer inquiries
whatsapp._comment4: open = respond to all DMs (most permissive)
whatsapp._comment6: Allowlist - NOT USED with open policy
whatsapp._comment7: With open policy, anyone can message the bot
whatsapp._comment8: Blocklist - block known spammers (optional but recommended)
whatsapp._comment9: Add numbers that have spammed or abused the bot
whatsapp._comment11: Self-Chat Mode - DISABLED for business numbers
whatsapp._comment12: This IS the dedicated business number, not your personal phone
whatsapp._comment13: No need to restrict to single owner - customers need to reach it
whatsapp._comment14: Owner Number - optional for business use
whatsapp._comment15: Can set to business owner for notifications, or leave null
whatsapp._comment16: Verbose logging - recommended for business use
whatsapp._comment17: Enables detailed logs for customer support tracking
whatsapp._comment21: For Docker: set to mounted volume path

accounts._comment23: If running multiple business lines, configure here

whatsapp._comment24: Remove 'accounts' section if not using multi-account

_additional_notes.monitoring: Monitor usage and costs - open policy means anyone can use your AI
_additional_notes.rate_limits: Consider implementing rate limiting in your WOPR agent configuration
_additional_notes.business_hours: Configure WOPR agent to mention business hours in responses
_additional_notes.escalation: Set up escalation path for complex issues in your agent prompt
